name: Do it Yourself Surgery
description:
Do it Yourself Surgery is a design and dexterity game for two or more players. One player preps a patient by applying stickers. Then the other player performs surgery by drawing a line that connects some stickers and avoids others -- without drawing on the patient themself.

You will need: A patient, a sheet of clear acetate, a dry-erase marker, and a bunch of stickers. D.I.Y. Surgery provides a gentle onramp to thinking about level design and difficulty in play. It can also be played with a huge group of people -- see the D.I.Y. Surgery variant.

Do it Yourself Surgery is a Sorry Not Sorry Game.
